name: TagGroupProps
description:
A tag group is a focusable list of labels, categories, keywords, filters, or other items,
with support for keyboard navigation, selection, and removal.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the current element.

aria-labelledby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that labels the current element.

aria-describedby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that describes the object.

aria-details.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that provide a detailed, extended description for the object.

defaultSelectedKeys.description: The initial selected keys in the collection (uncontrolled).

disabledKeys.description: The item keys that are disabled. These items cannot be selected, focused, or otherwise interacted with.

disallowEmptySelection.description: Whether the collection allows empty selection.

escapeKeyBehavior.description:
Whether pressing the escape key should clear selection in the TagGroup or not.

Most experiences should not modify this option as it eliminates a keyboard user's ability to
easily clear selection. Only use if the escape key is being handled externally or should not
trigger selection clearing contextually.

onRemove.description: Handler that is called when a user deletes a tag.

onSelectionChange.description: Handler that is called when the selection changes.

selectedKeys.description: The currently selected keys in the collection (controlled).

selectionBehavior.description: How multiple selection should behave in the collection.

selectionMode.description: The type of selection that is allowed in the collection.

shouldSelectOnPressUp.description: Whether selection should occur on press up instead of press down.

slot.description:
A slot name for the component. Slots allow the component to receive props from a parent component.
An explicit `null` value indicates that the local props completely override all props received from a parent.
